review: I was very disappointed with the Fire Stick. I purchased a chromecast the se week as the Fire stick. I believed the Fire stick was better quality but I was most certainly wrong about that! The Fire stick would barely work! It would rarely connect to the wifi and if by some miracle it connected it would not stay connected. All of my other tablets and devices were connected to the wifi including the chromecast that worked each and every time I used it! the Fire Stick is just not a good product. It just simply does not work.

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is phenomenal! I own 2 Roku 3's, and Amazon Fire TV Box and got this Stick free with a 3 month subscription of SlingTV. This is my GO TO device when I'm on the go. Hotels, in-laws, etc. I no longer take my laptop or ipad when traveling for work. I just grab my AFTS and know that I'll have access to my Plex Media Server, Sling, Netflix, Amazon Prime, and so much more. If you have anything other than a Roku 3 or AFTB and are looking to upgrade for a minimal cost, the AFTS is clearly the best choice. It out performs the Chromecast, older rokus, and most smart TVs. Take it from a computer/electronic junkie and pick this thing up!-WillThis product loses quality in the microwave. :)
